titles: The steele glas A satyre co[m]piled by George Gascoigne Esquire. Togither with The complainte of Phylomene. An elegie deuised by the same author.
author: Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.
publisher: Printed [by Henrie Binneman] for Richard Smith,
notes: "The complaynt of Phylomene" has separate title page with imprint "Imprinted at London by Henrie Binneman, for Richarde Smith. Anno Domini 1576"; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
